alert.note: Alert for Kay; Noble (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 02 at 5:28PM CDT until May 02 at 6:15PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Kay County in northern Oklahoma... Northeastern Noble County in northern Oklahoma... * Until 615 PM CDT. * At 527 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Tonkawa, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Ponca City, Tonkawa, Kaw City and Kaw Lake. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect for the warned area. Tornadoes can develop quickly from severe thunderstorms. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
